General.Name: Golden Sky Minerals Corp
General.Description: Golden Sky Minerals Corp. operates as a mineral exploration company in Canada. The company engages in acquisition, development, exploration, and evaluation of mineral properties. It explores for gold deposits. The company was formerly known as Luckystrike Resources Ltd. and changed its name to Golden Sky Minerals Corp. in February 2020. Golden Sky Minerals Corp. was incorporated in 2018 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 650 West Georgia Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6B 4N9
